topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55307ba06368727165020800#post_55307ba06368727165020800
you seem to have a decent grasp on his face. I mean it's simple but it looks certainly looks like him


I say will say this if you want to improve, drop paint For your next drawing and move to a pencile and paper or something like that. Creating shapes with your own hands is better than using a tool for it even if you can't get the exact shape you want. Plus a pencil can be easier to control than a mouse.
